description:
Oh, Suddenly Egyptian God Episode 8 – Suddenly, An Idol / Suddenly, Pottery: Anubis and the gang enjoy a concert put on by the serpentine idol Sata, before taking in a pottery class from the stern but passionate Khnum.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toutotsu ni Idol / Toutotsu ni Tougei
とーとつにアイドル / とーとつにとーげい
